blogPost.title: What are some things people should look for in an interview? Answer by @AttaTarki, CEO of @ECA_Partners and the author of Evidence-Based Recruiting. https://t.co/QmkDHcVtQ4 https://t.co/3WAsVtLamu
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 面接ではどのようなことに気をつければいいのでしょうか？答えは、@ECA_PartnersのCEOであり、『Evidence-Based Recruiting』の著者である@AttaTarki氏。https://t.co/QmkDHcVtQ4 https://t.co/3WAsVtLamu
人们在面试中应该注意哪些事情？回答者：@AttaTarki，@ECA_Partners的首席执行官，《基于证据的招聘》的作者。https://t.co/QmkDHcVtQ4 https://t.co/3WAsVtLamu
人們在面試中應該注意哪些事情？回答者：@AttaTarki，@ECA_Partners的首席執行官，《基於證據的招聘》的作者。https://t.co/QmkDHcVtQ4 https://t.co/3WAsVtLamu

previous.title: How can being outside affect your health? Answer by @alyraz, Founder @Hipcamp. https://t.co/JFQkPGg8hz https://t.co/DQefGF7qCo

localize.full_text: 外出が健康に与える影響とは？回答者： @alyraz, Founder @Hipcamp. https://t.co/JFQkPGg8hz https://t.co/DQefGF7qCo
户外活动如何影响你的健康？由 @alyraz, 创始人 @Hipcamp 回答。https://t.co/JFQkPGg8hz https://t.co/DQefGF7qCo
戶外活動如何影響你的健康？由 @alyraz, 創始人 @Hipcamp 回答。https://t.co/JFQkPGg8hz https://t.co/DQefGF7qCo

next.title: What will fundraising look like post COVID? Answer by @josh_coyne, Investor @kleinerperkins. https://t.co/tUuJ28fRHX https://t.co/cB35h3da3K

localize.full_text: COVID後のファンドレイジングはどのようになるのでしょうか？Answer by @josh_coyne, Investor @kleinerperkins. https://t.co/tUuJ28fRHX https://t.co/cB35h3da3K
COVID之后的筹款将是什么样子？由 @josh_coyne, 投资者 @kleinerperkins 回答。https://t.co/tUuJ28fRHX https://t.co/cB35h3da3K
COVID之後的籌款將是什麼樣子？由 @josh_coyne, 投資者 @kleinerperkins 回答。https://t.co/tUuJ28fRHX https://t.co/cB35h3da3K
